text: The 1912 Summer Olympics, officially known as the Games of the V Olympiad, were held in Stockholm, Sweden.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "1912 Stockholm Summer Games" ; retrieved 2012-7-23. The games were thought to be a success.Zarnowski, C. Frank. "A Look at Olympic Costs," Citius, Altius, Fortius (US). Summer 1992, Vol. 1, Issue 1, p. 20 [5 of 17 PDF]; retrieved 2012-7-24. For the first time, athletes in the Games came from all five continents symbolised in the Olympic rings. == Participating nations == A total of 22 nations sent athletes to compete at the Stockholm games. title: 1912 Summer Olympics
